name: Vent Linnorm
description: A gargantuan dragon with a menacing presence, characterized by its strikingly powerful build, capable of instilling fear in its foes and adept in both water and land combat.
memorable: The Vent Linnorm wields the ability to instill fear and manipulate the battlefield with its unique Inky Breath weapon, which blinds opponents.
goals: Typically hunts and tracks prey, exploiting its Blood Scent ability to locate injured creatures.
relations: Possibly associated with other dragons or creatures of cold environments due to its ice immunity.
environment: Commonly found in cold waters or frigid landscapes.
strengths: Immunity to cold damage, ability to breathe underwater, blindsight for detecting prey in darkness.
weaknesses: Significantly slow on land, which may limit mobility in certain combat situations.
attacks: Multiattack includes a terrifying bite and powerful tail strikes, both capable of severe damage and restraining foes.
most_powerful_ability: Inky Breath releases a cloud of necrotic ink that blinds and damages enemies in a wide area.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures hidden in darkness.
skills: Highly skilled in intimidation and surviving in hostile environments, demonstrating its prowess in fear tactics.
additional_information: Can detect blood in water from up to 5 miles away.
Frightful Presence can incapacitate creatures nearby with fear.
Ability to grapple and restrain targets significantly enhances its control over the battlefield.
Effectively combines offense and defense due to high damage output and toughness.
Imposing size contributes to its intimidating presence in any encounter.
test_queries: aquatic creature that can smell blood
dragon with powerful bite and tail attacks
creature that controls battle with fear tactics
